name: m8

args.name: submodel
args.description: The model, as a function of dN/dS

args.name: n
args.description: The number of bins for discretizing the Beta distribution

args.name: mu
args.description: The mean of the Beta distribution

args.name: gamma
args.description: The fraction of possible Beta variance given mu

args.name: posP
args.description: The fraction of positively selected sites

args.name: posW
args.description: The dN/dS value for positively selected sites

description: The m8 model is an m7 model with an additional category of positively-selected sites.  The additional category of sites has proportion=posP and dN/dS=posW.

citation.title: Codon-Substitution Models for Heterogeneous Selection Pressure at Amino Acid Sites
